buy: Yud like tae purchase the %s, ye? That'll be %s gould piece.
error_generic: Sorry wean, ah’m no sure what yer askin.
help_generic: Haw pal. Try askin me `What's in stock?`. Make sure tae say ma name (@Prospector) so ah'know yer talking tae me.
help_flavour: If you've got a thick accent yer'll have tae speak up.
items_in_stock: Here’s what ah've for sale this week.
stock_last_one: That was my last one! Aw sould oot now.
stock_sold_out: Sorry wee bairn, sould oot of those earlier.
